name: Bakusou Zombie
description:
Intro:

Bakuzou Zombie is a Multiplayer Battle Royal game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The players will take the roles of survivors and zombies to battle each other to determine the ultimate winning side.

Zombified :

Start the game as the survivor, scatter around, and find weapons and shelters. Whether you want to group up or not is up to you, but do keep in mind when the zombified hour hits, one will turn into a zombie, and that one might be right next to you. 

How to win?
  • Survivors: Surviving until the timer runs out, fight or hide is all up to you. 
  • Zombies: How unfortunate you have turned into a zombie. Infect every survivor left in the game and win.
Battle:
  • Survivors: You are not just an ordinary survivor. You are an esper able to control magic and wield them in battle. Enjoy a wide range of elemental magic weapons and use them to decimate the zombies.
  • Zombies:  Although you can only punch, you have more stamina than any other esper. Use your movement advantages, and swarm the survivors. If you can't catch them, remember you were once an esper too. Aim and shoot your ultimate zombie attack and decimate the survivors!!!
